tool_description: Retrieves real-time and historical traffic data for route segments to enable traffic-aware routing decisions.

route_segments.description: Array of route segments as 'start_lat,start_lng:end_lat,end_lng' strings

include_incidents.description: Include traffic incidents and road closures

error_messages: Invalid route segment format: Use 'start_lat,start_lng:end_lat,end_lng' format.
Traffic service unavailable: Real-time traffic data is temporarily unavailable.
Invalid query time: Use ISO 8601 date-time format.
Segment limit exceeded: Maximum 100 route segments per request.
Geographic coverage limitation: Traffic data not available for requested region.
usage: Provide route segments with optional query time and incident inclusion. Returns traffic conditions and flow data for each segment.

traffic_conditions.description: Array of traffic conditions as 'segment_index:condition:speed_ratio' strings

incidents.description: Array of traffic incidents affecting the route segments

data_timestamp.description: Timestamp when traffic data was collected
